filmography.title: Man of the World
filmography.role_description: A rival editor who competes with William Powell's character for the affection of Carole Lombard in this early romantic drama.
filmography.plot: A former novelist running a blackmail racket in Paris falls for the niece of one of his victims.

filmography.title: Saratoga
filmography.role_description: A wealthy wall street broker whose gambling and romance with Jean Harlow drive the plot.
filmography.plot: A bookie and the daughter of a horse breeder clash over the family farm and a racehorse.

filmography.title: The Girl of the Golden West
filmography.role_description: The resolute sheriff who rivals a bandit for the love of a saloon owner in this musical western.
filmography.plot: A beautiful saloon owner falls in love with a bandit, unaware of his true identity, while the local sheriff pursues him.

filmography.title: Too Hot to Handle
filmography.role_description: A rival newsreel cameraman who competes fiercely with Clark Gable's character for stories and women.
filmography.plot: A newsreel cameraman and a female aviator compete for stories and romance in China and the Amazon.

filmography.title: Dark Command
filmography.role_description: A Confederate guerrilla leader who turns from schoolteacher to ruthless renegade during the Civil War.
filmography.plot: A Texas cowboy wins the marshal's job in Lawrence, Kansas, causing a rival to turn to guerrilla warfare.

filmography.title: Man Hunt
filmography.role_description: A British big-game hunter who stalks Hitler for sport, gets captured, and then hunted himself by the Gestapo.
filmography.plot: A British hunter vacationing in Bavaria gets Hitler in his gun sight, is caught, beaten, and left for dead, but escapes back to London.

filmography.title: Blossoms in the Dust
filmography.role_description: The supportive husband of Edna Gladney, who helps her found an orphanage and fight for children's rights.
filmography.plot: After losing her own child, a woman dedicates her life to helping orphans and changing the laws regarding illegitimate children.

filmography.title: How Green Was My Valley
filmography.role_description: The village preacher who serves as a moral compass and shares an unspoken love with the daughter of a mining family.
filmography.plot: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans raise coal-mining sons and hope for a better future.

filmography.title: Mrs. Miniver
filmography.role_description: The steadfast British husband and father who helps his family navigate the trials of World War II on the home front.
filmography.plot: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II while their son goes off to fight and their village is bombed.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; Oscar: Win – Best Picture

filmography.title: White Cargo
filmography.role_description: A cynical rubber plantation manager in Africa who warns a newcomer about the dangers of the jungle and 'Tondelayo'.
filmography.plot: A man arriving at a remote African rubber plantation is warned to stay away from the native woman Tondelayo.

filmography.title: Madame Curie
filmography.role_description: The dedicated physicist who partners with Marie Curie in life and science, leading to the discovery of radium.
filmography.plot: A biography of the French scientists Marie and Pierre Curie and their discovery of radium.

filmography.title: Mrs. Parkington
filmography.role_description: A dashing and ambitious tycoon whose rise to wealth and turbulent marriage is recounted in flashbacks.
filmography.plot: An 84-year-old matriarch recounts her rise from a Nevada boarding house to New York high society.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor (Cecil Kellaway)

filmography.title: Julia Misbehaves
filmography.role_description: A wealthy man whose estranged, showgirl wife returns to crash their daughter's wedding.
filmography.plot: A showgirl tries to get her daughter married off and win back her ex-husband in this screwball comedy.

filmography.title: Command Decision
filmography.role_description: A politically minded general who must balance military necessity with public relations during WWII bombing raids.
filmography.plot: A general must make the difficult decision to send his bomber crews on a dangerous mission to destroy German jet fighter plants.

filmography.title: That Forsyte Woman
filmography.role_description: An artistic outcast of the wealthy Forsyte family who falls in love with his cousin's unhappy wife.
filmography.plot: The wife of a wealthy, cold Victorian aristocrat falls in love with the architect engaged to her husband's niece.

filmography.title: The Miniver Story
filmography.role_description: Reprising his role as the devoted husband, coping with post-war changes and his wife's terminal illness.
filmography.plot: In this sequel to Mrs. Miniver, the family matriarch discovers she has a terminal heart condition and tries to settle her family's happiness before she dies.

filmography.title: Million Dollar Mermaid
filmography.role_description: The supportive father of Australian swimmer Annette Kellerman, who encourages her career in aquatic performance.
filmography.plot: The biography of Australian swimming champion and vaudeville star Annette Kellerman.

filmography.title: The Bad and the Beautiful
filmography.role_description: A pragmatic studio producer who serves as the confidant and sometimes conscience to a ruthless filmmaker.
filmography.plot: An unscrupulous movie producer alienates a director, an actress, and a writer while making them stars.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actress (Gloria Grahame)

filmography.title: Scandal at Scourie
filmography.role_description: A Canadian politician whose wife's decision to adopt a Catholic orphan causes controversy in their Protestant town.
filmography.plot: A Protestant couple in a Canadian town adopts a Catholic orphan, causing political and social turmoil.

filmography.title: Executive Suite
filmography.role_description: A loyal, long-serving executive who navigates the power struggle for the company presidency after the CEO's death.
filmography.plot: When a powerful CEO dies suddenly, a boardroom power struggle erupts to determine his successor.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Win – Special Jury Prize

filmography.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, carefree father whose lifestyle influences his daughter's tragic marriage.
filmography.plot: An American writer recalls his turbulent marriage to a wealthy girl in post-WWII Paris.

filmography.title: Deep in My Heart
filmography.role_description: The famous theatrical producer who works with composer Sigmund Romberg.
filmography.plot: A biography of the Hungarian-born composer Sigmund Romberg.

filmography.title: Forbidden Planet
filmography.role_description: A brilliant philologist living in isolation on a distant planet, whose subconscious manifests as an unstoppable monster.
filmography.plot: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them holds.

filmography.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
filmography.role_description: The visionary creator of a nuclear submarine who races to save the world from a burning radiation belt.
filmography.plot: The crew of a nuclear submarine must race to save the world when the Van Allen radiation belt catches fire.

filmography.title: Advise & Consent
filmography.role_description: The pragmatic Senate Majority Leader who tries to shepherd a controversial nomination through a political minefield.
filmography.plot: A Senate investigation into a controversial Secretary of State nominee uncovers secrets and blackmail.

filmography.title: Funny Girl
filmography.role_description: The legendary showman who discovers Fanny Brice and makes her a star in his Follies.
filmography.plot: The life of Fanny Brice, from her early days in the Jewish slums of the Lower East Side to the height of her career with the Ziegfeld Follies.

filmography.title: Skyjacked
filmography.role_description: A U.S. Senator aboard a hijacked flight who helps keep the passengers calm during the crisis.
filmography.plot: A crazed Vietnam vet bomber hijacks a Boeing 707 and demands to be taken to Russia.
